overview:
## Return Value

The shared [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKDocumentType] instance based on the provided identifier.

## Discussion

This method returns an instance of the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantityType] concrete subclass. HealthKit uses document types to manage medical documents. Use document type instances to create document samples that you can save in the HealthKit store. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKDocumentSample].

# documentType(forIdentifier:)

**Type Method**

Returns the shared document type for the provided identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
class func documentType(forIdentifier identifier: HKDocumentTypeIdentifier) -> HKDocumentType?
```

## Parameters

- **identifier**: A document type identifier. For a list of valid identifiers, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKDocumentTypeIdentifier].

## Return Value

The shared [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKDocumentType] instance based on the provided identifier.

## Discussion

This method returns an instance of the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantityType] concrete subclass. HealthKit uses document types to manage medical documents. Use document type instances to create document samples that you can save in the HealthKit store. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKDocumentSample].

## Creating document types

- **HKDocumentTypeIdentifier**: The identifiers for documents.
